gbw_one_stage: GBW ≈ gm/CL under single-pole unity-gain assumptions
Cite CL (C1) and input gm devices (M3/M4)
ota_rout_high_swing_telescopic: Telescopic cascode; small-signal; cite M6 at vop and M1 NMOS cascode
ota_swing_high_swing_telescopic: High-side: VDD - 2*V*; Low-side: 3*V* (tail + input + NMOS cascode)
Wide-swing mirror lets M6/M7 V* be small (can be ≪ VGS); single-ended vop
